products.name: Tonkotsu
products.description: Pork broth base, thin cut fresh noodles topped with chashu pork belly, bamboo shoots, spring onions, burnt garlic oil and seasoned egg

products.name: Shoyu
products.description: Chicken broth and soy sauce base, classic fresh noodles topped with chashu pork belly, bamboo shoots, spring onions and seasoned egg.

products.name: Chilli Prawn
products.description: Chicken broth and sea salt base. Classic fresh noodles topped with chilli tiger prawns, wakame, bamboo shoots, lemon wedge, spring onions and seasoned egg

products.name: Japanese Mushroom Miso
products.description: Konbu and shiitake broth, miso base. Classic fresh noodles topped with shiitake, enoki & shimeji mushrooms, bok choy, mange tout and bamboo shoots

products.name: Soya tantanman
products.description: Konbu and shiitake broth, spicy sesame base. Classic fresh noodles topped with plant based soya mince, bok choy, kikurage and pickled radish.
